actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to impose fees under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act for the review of applications for marketing approval for new human and animal drugs, antibiotics, medical devices, and biological products, and for other purposes.
short_title: New Drug and Device Application Fee Amendments of 1989

summary.text: New Drug and Device Application Fee Amendments of 1989 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish fees to cover the costs of review for: (1) food additives; (2) new drugs; (3) antibiotic drugs; (4) medical devices; (5) new animal drugs; and (6) biologic products licensing.

titles.title: New Drug and Device Application Fee Amendments of 1989

To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to impose fees under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act for the review of applications for marketing approval for new human and animal drugs, antibiotics, medical devices, and biological products, and for other purposes.
